name: Ystar
description: YSR (Ystar Resident) is an internal generated token of Ystar ecosystem. The essential business goal of Ystar is to erase the gap of user experiences between traditional internet and blockchain world. With the help of YSR incentive module, Ystar will be able to introduce 4.4 billion users into blockchain world thus to build an ecosystem of ad traffic consensus. YSR will be used in terms of user behavior mining, user incentive, settlement of finical service and payments of ad traffic service supplied by Ystar ecosystem. 95% of the Ystar ad service income will be distributed to users through user behavior incentive or repurchase from the second market by Ystar team to help Ystar construct a virtuous cycle ecology.
